idea-plugin.name: REST Automation
idea-plugin.description:
IntelliJ plugin to provide automation support.
It allows to recompile the code via a REST interface.
Currently supported interfaces: /Recompile, /Compile, /Version
Configure the REST port in the settings under 'REST Automation'
